name: react-custom-modals
description: A collection of reusable React components designed to streamline frontend development. Includes modal dialogs, form inputs, and responsive layout components. Ideal for developers looking to enhance user interfaces with minimal setup and maximum customization options.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --copy-files --ignore __tests__,spec.js,test.js,__snapshots__
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
